Release LTS.425.6 of August 29, 2024
New features
1. It is now possible to customize the header display in the
light registry
.
2. The registry virtual column was improved with new option to specify the attribute type.
It is now possible to automatically
restart ETL operation
when an abnormal interruption of ETL processing occurs.
It is now possible to customize the control panel buttons for the start page of the mobile app.
Changes and improvements
For
object attributes
with multiple selections, the process of creating a two-way relation was debugged and the filtering mechanism was improved;
Opening the
primitive object
profile from the registry was debugged;
The ability to hide tab group outer frames when using any design theme was stabilized;
In
dashboards
, the ability to apply default chart height and width values was stabilized;
The customization of
communication-panel
was improved;
The display of object drop-down lists when configuring profiles in
login page constructor
was debugged;
Working with
“Selecting from directory as radio buttons” visual
object attribute was stabilized;
Filtering of registry instances with
Rating widget
was debugged;
The display of the
“Progress-bar”
and
“Employee information”
widgets was stabilized;
The display of the registry when grouping and aggregating by an empty column was stabilized;
The header length display was adjusted to the available width in the Light registry;
The ability to filter values was stabilized in the registry;
The process of selecting an icon for the
main menu items
folder was debugged;
The work of the “Menu item: FAQ” module was improved;
Working with
dict
function was debugged;
For
attr
function, the process of attaching an array of objects from files to an attribute is debugged
The need to select a single value to go from task stage
business process
is now unnecessary;
In action auditing, the process of adding a new record of access permission change was debugged, as well as displaying a link to the object on which the action was started;
The transfer of
updates
containing visuals with frames was stabilized;
Registry settings
update migration was stabilized
The ability to use the mouse scroll wheel when selecting an extension was debugged;
In the eDoc module, when creating a source and its highlighting algorithm, the template of the print form on which the source is created is automatically set. The comment text now has no character limit;
In the eDoc module, the ability to change the document scale using hotkeys was improved, as well as the display of comments in the exported document.
In the eDoc module, comparison of main source wording with typical wording was improved;
Data display in modal windows was stabilized;
Working with
dict
and
getObject
was improved;
getSelected
was optimized when working with chain attributes;
Registry display in edit mode was stabilized.
